scripts.change-tauri: switch.exe src tauri on && switch.exe vite.config.ts chrome_extension off && switch.exe src web off
scripts.change-githubPages: vite.config.ts chrome_extension off && switch.exe src web on
scripts.change-chrome-extension: vite.config.ts chrome_extension off && switch.exe src web on
scripts.build: npm run change-tauri && tsc && vite build
scripts.githubPages: npm run change-githubPages && tsc && vite build --outDir docs --base="./" && npm run change-tauri
scripts.chrome-extension: npm run change-chrome-extension && tsc && vite build && npm run change-tauri
